Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would greatly benefit you and align well with your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your expectations. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this product into your possession. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
